item.title: Pieces of Py: Introduction
item.description:
The Pieces of Py category of articles on this blog, are meant to be articles on small pieces of Python code. It's meant to show some concepts that I've learned during my exercises and coding in Python.

For me it will be likes notes I can come back to when …
item.dc:creator: J-O

item.title: Pieces of Py #1: Decorator with arguments
item.description:
This post is a simple example that explains how to create a decorator function that accepts and uses argument(s). A decorator that would accept an argument could look like this:

@mydecorator(my_argument)
def my_decorated_function(input):
    return input

A simple scenario could be that you would like to print something …
item.dc:creator: J-O
